DOC.brief_summary: The aim study explore concept GnRH-agonist trigger combination elective cryopreservation 2PN oocyte large scale pragmatic clinical setting . The question ask : `` Does GnRH-agonist trigger cryopreservation work '' , term efficacy safety , apply large cohort patient , number different centre different clinical routine .
DOC.brief_title: Ovarian Hyperstimulation Syndrome ( OHSS ) Prevention With Agonist
DOC.criteria: Indication IVF ICSI Age < 40 year < 4 fail previous IVF attempt embryo transfer ovarian stimulation GnRHantagonist gonadotrophins > 20 follicle > 11 mm mean diameter E2 > 4500 pg/ml day , plan administer hCG willing participate able consent patient previously receive GnRHagonist trigger final oocyte maturation
